title: Counterfeiting stamps
context: [ยง245-36] Counterfeiting stamps. A person shall be guilty of a class B felony if the person: (1) Intentionally or knowingly makes, alters, or reuses a stamp as defined in section 245-1; or (2) Knowingly possesses or distributes a stamp that has been falsely made, altered, or reused. [L 2000, c 249, pt of ยง1]
